path: the path column will be raw/private  raw/public  derived/private  or derived/public
the name will be the file name
the source will be UNEP-GRID DHS Surveys or FEWSnet for raw dat a or it will be the data files used to create derived data
the metadata will be a list of metadata files providing additional information on any raw data source.
